posts.post_title: FINAL PRICE DROP - NOW $165 (6) T206s w/SLs, American Beauty, Old Mill, etc. PSA/SGC
posts.post_content:
FINAL PRICE DROP - NOW $165.00

Up for sale is a lot of (6) T206 cards. Included are the following:

Harry Lentz/Sentz (SOUTHERN LEAGUER) Piedmont 350 - GRADED PSA 2
Foley White (SOUTHERN LEAGUER) Piedmont 350 - GRADED SGC 10
Harry Bay (SOUTHERN LEAGUER) Old Mill Back
Bill Abstein American Beauty 350/Frame Back
Bill Carrigan Sweet Caporal 350 Back
Claude Rossman Piedmont 350 Back

For now, I'm only interested in moving these as a lot. All lower-grade cards here but not abused. The Abstein, though, has several creases. Rossman has a unique back stamp.

Asking [STRIKE]$225[/STRIKE] [STRIKE]$200[/STRIKE] $165 delivered via PPFF (Add 3% for regular PP). Final drop before eBay.
